title: Add project field to ticks
description:
Add a first-class project field to ticks for grouping tasks/epics by project code. Enables filtering, querying, and tracking work across projects.

Spec: docs/2026-01-14-5464-project-dim/SPEC.md
notes:
2026-01-14 19:54 - Iteration 1 complete: Environment validated. Build passes, all 7 test packages pass. Key packages for project field implementation: internal/tick (tick data model), internal/query (filtering/querying), cmd/tk (CLI commands). No test files exist for internal/tui and internal/update.
2026-01-14 19:55 - Iteration 1 complete: Build and tests verified. All 7 test packages pass. Key files to modify per SPEC.md: internal/tick/tick.go (add Project field), cmd/create.go, cmd/update.go, cmd/list.go, cmd/ready.go, cmd/next.go, cmd/show.go. No migration needed - missing field defaults to empty string (Go zero value).
